des:
You can easily control your home lighting and other devices hands free with Alexa. Just say it, VUGERA will obey.

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Download our "VUGERA Doorbell" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account;
(3). Turn on VUGERA devices and connect them with "VUGERA Doorbell" app;
(4). Configure these devices in "VUGERA Doorbell" app and change the appropriate name for your devices;
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app in Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
(6). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "VUGERA Smart";
(7). Click Enable skill of "VUGERA Smart", then input your username, password on the login page;
(8). Talk to Echo "Alexa, discover devices". Wait until Echo says "Discover is completed";
(9). Now all setup is done.

Here are the voice commands VUGERA has:

Light:
"Alexa, discover my devices."
"Alexa, turn on the light."
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom light."
"Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."

Switch:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom switch."
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom switch."

Curtain:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom curtain."
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom curtain."

Socket:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom socket."
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom socket."
